NOTICE OF SEALED BID OPENING FOR SALE OF REAL PROPERTY The City of Karnes City, Texas (the â€œCityâ€) is accepting sealed bids for the purchase of the following real property (the â€œPropertyâ€) as described in this Notice of Sealed Bid Opening: The Property commonly known as 211 E. Calvert, Karnes City, Texas 78118, being legally described as consisting of approximately 0.0670 acres of land, KARNES CITY COMMON WALL, BLK 20, LOT 16, CITY OF KARNES CITY, KARNES COUNTY, TEXAS. The Property contains an existing structure that includes approximately 2,580 sq. ft. of rentable office space, as well as an additional 1, 152 sq. ft. of unfinished space on the second story. It is the intention of the City to sell the Property based on the best value bid that is submitted. If, in the judgment of the City Council, none of the bids submitted represent the fair value of the Property, the City reserves the right to reject any and all bids. Should any bid be accepted, payment shall be made by earnest money deposit, subject to closing, and shall be deposited with the City or designated escrow agent by cashierâ€™s check or money order payable to â€œCity of Karnes City, Texasâ€ within ten days of the award notice. RECOMMENDED MINIMUM BID: $230,000.00 The property will be sold â€œas isâ€ with no warranties or representations as to suitability for any particular use. Conveyance of the property will be by special warranty deed. Bids shall be delivered in writing, signed by the bidder or an authorized representative, and enclosed in a sealed envelope to the City of Karnes City, C/O Veronica Butler, City Manager, 1007 N. Hwy 123, Karnes City, Texas 78118. All bids shall be plainly marked â€œSEALED BID TO PURCHASE REAL PROPERTY.â€ Bids must be received before 4:30 p.m. on July 10, 2025, and any bid received after that time will not be considered. City Council will open, read, and tabulate the bids at 6:00 p.m. on July 22, 2025, at City Hall, 1007 N. HWY 123, City of Karnes City. Bidders may contact Veronica Butler, City Manager, at 830-780-3422 for clarifications and questions
